title: FS: 1912 Underwood & Underwood #737 Hick Cady Red Sox Postcard
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 Underwood & Underwood #737 Hick Cady Red Sox Postcard
posts.post_content:
Hi guys,
Here's one from my personal collection, a beautiful 1912 Underwood & Underwood #737 Real Photo Postcard of Red Sox Catcher Hick Cady. Outstanding clarity on this image! Price is $1100 USD OBO including shipping tracking and insurance from Canada. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
Jeff

I keep stopping in to look at this.

What a neat piece!

Thanks for the kind words, it's a great piece! Last price drop on this fine postcard before it goes back into the vault... $850 USD delivered. Cheers!
Jeff
